basics.name: Noam Ringach
basics.label: PhD Student
basics.summary: A third year PhD student working in pseduorandomness under Eshan Chattopadhyay.

publications.name: Two-Sided Lossless Expanders in the Unbalanced Setting
publications.summary: Chattopadhyay, E., Gurumukhani, M., Ringach, N., & Zhao, Y. (2024, September). Two-Sided Lossless Expanders in the Unbalanced Setting. Retrieved from https://eccc.weizmann.ac.il/report/2024/133/

publications.name: On the Existence of Seedless Condensers: Exploring the Terrain
publications.summary: Chattopadhyay, E., Gurumukhani, M., & Ringach, N. (2024). On the Existence of Seedless Condensers: Exploring the Terrain. 2024 IEEE 65th Annual Symposium on Foundations of Computer Science (FOCS). Retrieved from http://arxiv.org/abs/2312.15087

publications.name: Cerebellar nuclei evolved by repeatedly duplicating a conserved cell-type set
publications.summary: Justus M. Kebschull et al. ,Cerebellar nuclei evolved by repeatedly duplicating a conserved cell-type set. Science 370, eabd5059 (2020). DOI: 10.1126/science.abd5059
